seniority_level.evidence: 3+ years data scientist experience + 5+ years Python experience + production model deployment + business stakeholder presentation requirements

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Scientist' with core focus on ML model development, statistical analysis, and business insights

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on predictive modeling for insurance claims, data science techniques, and business insights rather than specific technical infrastructure

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions building and supporting a team of data scientists and analysts, presenting to stakeholders, but no direct reports mentioned

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud providers mentioned in job description or requirements

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: No specific mention of streaming vs batch processing paradigms

orchestrator_category.evidence: No workflow orchestration tools mentioned (Airflow mentioned in team bio but not as requirement)

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data storage systems mentioned

remote_restriction.evidence: Fully distributed company with no office, employees can work from wherever they do their best work

timezone_focus.evidence: Fully distributed but prioritizing meetings in US time zones, and location restricted to Latin American countries

relocation_required.evidence: Fully distributed remote work with no office, no relocation mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, and role restricted to specific Latin American countries

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, and geographic restrictions suggest local work authorization required

citizenship_required.evidence: Must be resident in one of 6 specified Latin American countries, suggesting work authorization in those countries required

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Position explicitly stated as 'Contract' with contractor compensation determined by market data and experience

benefits_level.evidence: Limited benefits for contractors: language classes ($100/year), unpaid parental leave, computer reimbursement

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression or growth path mentioned in job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship program or working with senior people mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion or advancement opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers or role changes mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks or advancement paths mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have requirements (3+ years experience, Python skills) balanced with nice-to-have (Airflow, Spark)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused data scientist role with well-defined responsibilities in insurance modeling and business insights

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Reasonable skill requirements for senior data scientist level - 3+ years experience with Python and ML models
